page.title: 10Woburn Lifestyle 2
page.content: {Restaurants and Cafes} There is a varied selection of Restaurants in Woburn which are popular with both tourists and locals alike.{The Bedford Arms}has an elegant restaurant designed by{Henry Holland,} architect of Woburn Abbey. The{Black {Horse}is particularly popular with a wide selection of restaurant and bar meals at competitive prices.{Crispins} is an attractive restaurant which specialises in home produce.{ {Ristorante la Cantina}is a stylish Italian restaurant catering for special occasions. The{Magpie}and the{ {Bell}offer a wide variety of meals at competitive rates while{Annie's Place is open for lunches, teas and dinners at realistic prices. The{Wine Lodge} has a hot and cold buffet and is open daily. { }
